com.bretth.osmosis.core.store
Class ObjectWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.bretth.osmosis.core.store.ObjectWriter

public class ObjectWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides functionality to serialise a Storeable implementation to a store.

Author:
Brett Henderson
